name: My Name is Legion
description:
A top-down dungeon explorer where you need to find power-ups and choose which ones fit your style best. 

Download, extract and run the exe file. X to shoot, Z to create a shield.

Made by @saint11 with music by @azuria_sky. Thanks to @Kent2D for designing the logo!

Version history:

1.2: Fixed a bug in the power up music
1.1: Fixed minor bugs and missing sounds
